bibl.title: Letter to the King (?).
bibl.note: Arsinoite Nome, III B.C. The letter (written by the dioiketes?) refers to elephants, to clothing allowance and to the closure of a bathhouse.

bibl.title: Essays and Texts in Honor of J. David Thomas

bibl.idno: P. Dublin Inv. TCD Sel. Box 137 A + B = P. Thomas 1

bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Dublin Inv. TCD Sel. Box 137 A + B = P. Thomas 1
McGING Brian C., Letter to the King (?).
Traianos GAGOS and Roger S. BAGNALL (Edd.), Essays and Texts in Honor of J. David Thomas = American Studies in Papyrology. 42 (Oakville, Connecticut, 2001) pp. 71-76 et pl. 4.
Arsinoite Nome, III B.C. The letter (written by the dioiketes?) refers to elephants, to clothing allowance and to the closure of a bathhouse.
